Notes

Contains download code for the MP3 version of this release. Printed innersleeves with graphics and credits. 180gram vinyl pressing. Initially marketed as "Limited Edition" with a hype sticker. Repressed with round silver sticker "FREE DOWNLOAD FOR THIS RELEASE SEE CODE INSIDE NINJATUNE"
